articles.author: David Pasztor
articles.title: Chelsea 'weigh up' Guéhi approach after Fofana ACL, Chalobah concern - We Ain't Got No History
articles.content: Marc Guéhi was one of the best young center backs to come through the Chelsea Academy in recent years, but at the time of his ascension, there wasnt much room for him in the first-team. Obviously, we… [+2165 chars]
